headline: Chipotle Aims New Rewards Program at College Students, With a Side of Dorm Decor
summary: The burrito chain has increased its promotions after same-store sales fell 4% in the second quarter.

headline: Why Investors Have Soured on Restaurant Stocks
summary: Restaurants are starting to see a drop in traffic and pressure from higher commodity prices and labor costs. So, it's no surprise restaurant stocks are down big this year, but the size of the drop in names like Cava and Chipotle are shocking.

raw.headline: Why Investors Have Soured on Restaurant Stocks
raw.summary: Restaurants are starting to see a drop in traffic and pressure from higher commodity prices and labor costs. So, it's no surprise restaurant stocks are down big this year, but the size of the drop in names like Cava and Chipotle are shocking.

headline: Chipotle’s new rewards program lets Gen Z college students get free burritos faster. Here’s what to know
summary: The fast-casual chain’s focus on college towns is part of its strategy to increase growth and retain younger customers.

headline: CHIPOTLE UNVEILS FIRST-EVER COLLEGE REWARDS PROGRAM AND EXCLUSIVE DORM COLLECTION WITH URBAN OUTFITTERS
summary: Chipotle Mexican Grill (NYSE: CMG) today announced it is bringing more value to college students than ever before with a new Chipotle U Rewards program created to recognize and celebrate students at various milestones of their higher education journey. Chipotle is the first major national restaurant brand to launch a loyalty program for college students.

headline: Chipotle targets Gen Z with college rewards program
summary: The fast casual chain is offering free points, occasional prize drops and faster rewards accrual to loyalty members who validate their college enrollment.

headline: How Chili’s and Cheesecake Factory are defying consumer gloom and beating McDonald’s and Chipotle at their own game
summary: Chili’s reported a 24% jump in same-store sales in its most recent earnings report.
